title: A typewriter font?
content:
Can someone help me id a font like this example?

I was thinking something like ITC Officina Serif.

Thank you - sf

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090427162234im_/http:/typophile.com/files/typewriter15_5696.jpg)
author: SF

comments.content:
Your type sample is basically a sans face with serifs on a couple of letters. [Artisan 12](http://web.archive.org/web/20090427162234/http:/www.fontriver.com/font/artisan12/) is not identical, but the feeling is closer than Officina, I think.

- Mike Yanega
